name: GardenVR: Season of Seeds
description:
Version 1.3.1 Stable Build Released!

*PLEASE REDOWNLOAD IF YOU DOWNLOADED OLDER VERSIONS MANY BUGS FIXED IN V1.3 "THE BIG STABLE"*

Clear dead leaves, shovel planters, and water plants in the cutest garden sim with a shotgun you've ever seen. Relax to comfy beats as you plant veggies that pop outta the ground. Choose the best from your harvest to turn into seeds. Can you breed each crop to perfect quality?  As you rake in your sweet, seed money, expand your garden and buy new exciting tools like the seed shotgun as you plant seeds with each pull of the trigger.

Future Plans:  Updates are in the works to add new mechanics, tools, and plant varieties.

Drop by my discord for feedback and suggestions:
https://discord.gg/ZPujUqZJ

Updates Log:

V1.3.1
+ Fixed a bug where tomato seeds are created from carrots
+ Put players lower to the ground for better ergonomics

V1.3: The BIG STABLE BUILD
+ Save Button WIll Replace AutoSave
+ The big shelf will retain veggies and seedbags between  sessions.
+ More detailed help graphics
 
Day One Patch: No Man's Garden lmao
V1.2: Lots of Bug Fixes *Big thanks to ethan for reporting bugs and giving key feedback* xoxo

+ Fixed Bug Where Shotgun Would Be Immediately Available To Unlock
+ Changed Skybox to Matte Blue 
+ Fixed Carrot Socket Bug

Also, follow my IG @sixartsdragon
